data.text: @C_Kavanagh It's an interesting one.. for example I imagine Malone and McCullough might be accepted as expert witnesses in a court case on a vaccine risk sort of topic, based on their credentials on paper. But I can't imagine Brett would?
@C_Kavanagh Took me a sec but this Judge is a pretty well know commodity...not saying that negatively.  https://t.co/fYl7W6AwT1
@C_Kavanagh The real damage these crackpots are doing
@C_Kavanagh Wtf is wrong with that judge?

@C_Kavanagh Horrifying but not surprising. Courts are not the place to negotiate scientific truth, but it doesn't stop people from trying. The anti-gmo lobby also uses court decision over science to claim gmo causes cancer & court verdict proved it. This verdict above gonna do more harm
@davemcomie @C_Kavanagh It won't be bret and Heather's side
@C_Kavanagh Respect ALL institutions - except the ones you disagree with.

@cjtotalbro @C_Kavanagh What remains to be seen here is Who Is Right.
Lots of ppl are pretending to know, but that's all it is: pretending.

Copernicus never KNEW for a fact that he was right.  But we do, with the benefit of hindsight.

The same will be true here.  But which side will be proven right?
